description:
Hyakugan Yamigedo`s powerful abilities prove to be too much for Ikazuchi. As all seems lost, Tasuku receives aid from an unexpected ally: Kyoya and Suzaku. Gao is brought to the distant future to battle Hyakugan Yamigedo over the fate of humanity.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Save the World! A Hundred Despairs!
Sekai o Sukue! Zetsubou no Hundred!!
世界を救え! 絶望のハンドレッド!!
